Add or remove roles from a user.

## Usage

```sh
/roles add
/roles remove
```

## Subcommands

### add

Add a role to a user.

#### Options

|  Name  |          Description         | Required |
| :----: | :--------------------------: | :------: |
| `role` |       The role to add.       |    Yes   |
| `user` | The user to add the role to. |    No    |

### remove

Remove a role from a user.

#### Options

|  Name  |            Description            | Required |
| :----: | :-------------------------------: | :------: |
| `role` |        The role to remove.        |    Yes   |
| `user` | The user to remove the role from. |    No    |

## Required Permissions

:::note
Learn more about permissions in [Discord's FAQ](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206029707-Setting-Up-Permissions-FAQ).
:::

- Manage Roles
